description: This high-shine, long-lasting lipstick has a balm-like texture with intense, super-pigmented shades.
A lipstick-oil hybrid that melts onto your lips with a click stick component makes application super easy and fun.
A highly-pigmented matte lip color that provides non-drying comfort on the lips and leaves a suede finish.
A hydrating, eight-hour wear, liquid lipstick in a range of bold, full-coverage nudes.
